name: Getting Ready to Read and Add
description:
Getting Ready to Read and Add is an early level educational game for multiple systems.

It contains 6 mini-games involving matching:
  • ABC->: match similar letters
  • Alphasaurus: match similar letters
  • Beam Up: match similar shapes
  • Letter Getter: match capital and lower case letters
  • Moon Math: match similar letters
  • Number Chick: match numbers to pictures
alsoFor: Apple II, Commodore 64, DOS | Combined View
